column4: Can anybody help me out with my GPU issue? Ive noticed that any time my GPU hits 62 C, it crashes ubuntu.... Drives me insane when it happens to me at work.
It always happens when it gets to 62.
And yes, lmsensors, and the gnome applet.
what are you using to monitor your gpu temp
Its supposed to idle at 35-45.. and get fragmentation at 90 or so.
Its set to crash at 125 C
cat: /proc/drivers/nvidia/version: No such file or directory
How do I upgrade to the most recent?
I dunno if it'll work but what if you uninstall the ubuntu drivers and try installing from the official nvidia installer?
The last time I tried to do that, I couldnt get into GNOME. :) So Ive been a chicken ever since.
